text: No binaries appear to have been pushed for 1.2.41.0
creator: sthomas@littler.com

text: Correct. The ASF provides source releases. Binaries are sometimes, but not always, provided for convenience. Information on how to build binaries yourslef or pointers to 3rd parties who provide them are available via the users list.
creator: markt@apache.org
sthomas@littler.com
text:
I did build from source using MS Blend for VS.  I copied x86 settings to x64 and my .41 build runs like a charm on Win7 64bit IIS 7.5 - but does not run on windows 2012 IIS 8.5.  Is there anything I should be doing differently to build for IIS 8.5?

Filing a bug isn't the right forum for this..  I'll post this to the list.
